mapper.update: update member_auth a inner join member b on a.member_id = b.member_id set member_level = 2, a.member_auth = 'ROLE_SENIOR' ,b.enabled = '1' where a.member_id = #{member_id}

update senior set senior_email = #{senior_email}, senior_phone = #{senior_phone}, senior_crno = #{senior_crno}, senior_nick = #{senior_nick}, senior_bank_name = #{senior_bank_name}, senior_account_name = #{senior_account_name}, senior_account_num = #{senior_account_num} where member_id = #{member_id}
